reference.title: Reference: Course Selection
reference.shortdesc: This section provides information on selecting a course, group, and task in the DT PrepScanner App.

section.title: Overview
section.p: The Course Selection section of the DT PrepScanner App allows users to select a course, assign groups, and choose specific tasks within the selected course.

li.p: Select course: Choose the relevant course from the available list.
Select group: Assign or choose the appropriate group within the selected course.
Select task: Pick a task related to the course for further processing.

dlentry.dd: Modify specific course details, including Course, Group, Task, Task Due Date, Course Access Date, and Student Report Email Date.
Reset the selected course and group choices.
Remove an existing course from the system.
